oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: American Barn Dance - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: ABC radio program American Barn Dance, part 1. Featuring a mix of live and pre-recorded music and comedy, hosted by Eddie Dean.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Eddie Dean; Gloria Grey; Allen Massey; Cousin Dudley; Andy Parker; Plainsmen
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Announcer opening statement -- Opening theme -- Opening statement (Eddie Dean) -- When Payday Rolls Around (Eddie Dean) -- Eddie Dean introduces Gloria Grey -- Ask Me No Questions (And I'll Tell You No Lies) (Gloria Grey) (recording) -- [Unidentified fiddle tune] -- White Horse Bus commercial (Eddie Dean) -- In The Evening By The Moonlight (unidentified) -- Eddie Dean introduces Allen Massey -- Jimmy Crack Corn (Allen Massey) -- Eddie Dean introduces Allen Massey -- [Unidentified banjo medley, includes 'Old Folks At Home'] (Allen Massey) -- Comedy routine (Cousin Dudley) -- Eddie Dean introduces Andy Parker and the Plainsmen -- On The Banks Of The Wabash, Far Away (Andy Parker and the Plainsmen) (incomplete)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: American Broadcasting Company; American barn dance (Radio program); Dean, Eddie; Grey, Gloria (Vocalist); Massey, Allen; Plainsmen (Musical group); Parker, Andy, 1913-1977
